https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h8wmxZ63Lg5y9FOOfo69V5X19h0.jpg A documentary on Mou Tun-fei or T.F. Mou, the Chinese filmmaker best known for the harrowing, shockingly horrific World War II drama, Men Behind the Sun. Black Sunshine: Conversations with T.F. Mou
